content.rendered:
Viviana Padilla

Payroll and Accounting Assistant

Hello, my name is Viviana Padilla. As a Payroll and Accounting Assistant, I support our Payroll and Accountant Specialist. I am responsible for posting and reconciling timecards on a weekly basis. I also balance our billing reports, creating invoices that are then sent to our clients. I assist with payroll and billing questions from our contractors and clients. I love, helping others receive the best customer service we here at ATR can give.

 

ADVICE FOR CANDIDATES:

Be honest and be yourself, demonstrate passion and be prepared.

 

ADVICE FOR HIRING MANAGERS:

Learn from past mistakes from others that have hired.

 

INSPIRATIONAL QUOTE:

“What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achievbing you goals” Zig Ziglar
